formula: a(n)=2*sum(k=1..n, sum(j=0..(n-k)/2, binomial(n,n-k-2*j)*(k^(n-k-2*j)*sum(i=0..k/2, (2*i-k)^(k+2*j)*binomial(k,i)*(-1)^(j-i+1))))/(2^k*k)). [From Vladimir Kruchinin, Jun 13 2011]Lim sup n->infinity (|a(n)|/n!)^(1/n) = 0.840089206911... = abs(1/r), where r is the complex root of the equation r = log(-1/sin(r)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Nov 03 2013
author: _R. H. Hardin_
extensions: Extended with signs Mar 15 1997 by _Olivier GÃ©rard_.
